This is the main project in my current work. I am working on a website designated for manual testers and analysts. The web page includes email server, jenkins and analysis tools. In Jenkins can be found various automated tests written in selenium (testing of GUI) or made in Postman (testing of API). Unfortunatelly I cannot offer the source code.
